name: Undungeon (itch)
description:
Join Steve as he sets out on his first day as a Dungeoneer—one of the "lucky" undead minions of the mysterious Dungeon Master. His job is to clean the place up after the heroes, hopeful adventurers trying to conquer the dungeon, are defeated. As he works his way through the labyrinth, placing all the pilfered loot back in its rightful place, Steve meets a variety of strange characters. Some, it seems, are a bit out of place...

How To Play

  • Download  and run "undungeon.exe"
    • Sound recommended so you can hear our awesome voice actors!
    • 1920x1080p display or greater recommended!
  • Keyboard Controls: W A S D + Space Bar
  • Travel throughout the map, returning the loot to its altars and talking to characters for clues.
    • Be careful! If you put items back in an unfavorable order, you may make things harder on yourself...
  • Once the loot has been returned, talk to the fallen hero.
  • That's it for now!

Credits

  • Programming: ubersmok, Rakosman, DingoEatingFuzz
  • Art: Vertigo2720, DingoEatingFuzz
  • Voices: Vertigo2720, Miccix, FunkyHQ, EchoSierra, DingoEatingFuzz, Rakosman
